message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this round, but there's plenty more to come if we play smart.
I propose a balanced division for this round. We both receive a significant amount, setting a fair foundation for future rounds.

I'm willing to be reasonable, but I need to make up for the losses from the inflation. Let's split the money 60/40 this time. This will ensure both of us get a good share, and we can work towards a more balanced split in future rounds.
